  • Classes in bt.torrent used by bt.torrent 
    Class and Description
    Bitfield
    Status of torrent's data.
    Bitfield.PieceStatus
    Status of a particular piece.
    IPieceManager 
    PieceSelectionStrategy
    Implements a particular piece selection algorithm.
    PieceStatistics
    Provides basic information about the availability of different pieces in the swarm.
    RarestFirstSelectionStrategy
    Implements the "rarest-first" piece selection algorithm.
    SequentialSelectionStrategy
    Selects pieces sequentially in the order of their availability.
    TorrentDescriptor
    Provides an interface for controlling the state of a torrent processing session.
    TorrentRegistry
    Registry of all torrents known to the current runtime.
    TorrentSession
    Torrent processing session.
    TorrentSessionState
    Provides information about a particular torrent session.
